DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Safety Bupropion Hydrobromide Adolescents Children With Major Depressive Disorder
DOC.detailed_description: - The primary efficacy endpoint mean change Baseline EOT total CDRS-R ( raw ) score . - The secondary efficacy endpoint include : - Proportion subject characterize responder EOT ( ≥40 % improvement Baseline total CDRS-R raw score ) - Proportion subject characterize remission EOT ( total CDRS-R raw score < 29 ) - Mean change Baseline EOT CGI-C. Safety endpoint include : - Incidence AEs - Change Baseline EOT vital sign ( blood pressure radial pulse rate ) , blood urine laboratory panel , ECG - Treatment discontinuation due AEs - Suicidality assess C-SSRS score - Change Baseline EOT sleep assess sleep subscale CDRS-R .
